original_text: And when it was told me how that the Jews laid wait for the man, I sent straightway to thee, and gave commandment to his accusers also to say before thee what they had against him. Farewell.
korean_text: 그러나 이 사람을 해하려는 간계가 있다고 누가 내게 알려 주기로 곧 당신께로 보내며 또 고발하는 사람들도 당신 앞에서 그에 대하여 말하라 하였나이다 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And when it was told me
how that the Jews laid wait for the man
sentences.korean_translation: 유대인들이 그 사람을 위해 매복했다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and gave commandment to his accusers also

sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그에 대해 어떤 혐의가 있는지
